Started with this water profile:  https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1wAQ9INbwG00Zl_6WGqRb0vQ4lqTFn1AvzO1sgmW6KB4/edit#gid=0
Added 6 grams of calcium chloride to target the Rochefort water profile:
Calcium 82 mg/L 
Magnesium 10 mg/L 
Sodium 6 mg/L 
Sulfate 32 mg/L 
Chloride 17 mg/L 
Bicarbonate 240 mg/L
